synopsis.text: Shapiro Keats, a former Australian military leader turned imperial ally, emerges to reunite the estranged members of the Jyusenki-tai. Despite his longstanding loyalty to Muge Zarbados, Keats instigates a final confrontation, compelling the battle-weary warriors to assemble once more. In this climactic showdown, the Jyusenki-tai must confront their former comrade turned adversary, fighting for the fate of Earth and their homeland.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
